question: Who has been conferred with the 2017 Best astrologer of the world award?
explanation: The Hyderabad-based astrologer and numerologist TS Vineeth Bhatt has been conferred with the \'Best astrologer of the world\' award at the Russian-Indian economic dialogue round-table meet held in Moscow. The event was organized by Peacemakers International, a charity that works for advancement of conflict resolution through mediation services and training.
